1.content:
Who will you Choose

Leonard Butler

Eliza Butler

Edward Butler

Emily Butler

Next page:
1.title: Choose a Family Member

choices: Is going to eat more, she's still hungry
Starts noticing her family is getting bigger for some unknown reason
Gets a Visit/Visits a family member
She thinks about her children and decided they needed to be fed more
12.content:
Eliza was the Ed, Emily and Richard's mother, and head of the house, she is also a highschool teacher but decided to be a substitute teacher because that gave her more free time to do stuff and take care of the house. Shes 5'5" and weighs 190 lbs, she gained after her 3 child births and couldnt lose the weight.

One morning after she made breakfast and sent the kids and his husband to school and work respectively she sat down and thought what to do. She decided she:
12.title: Eliza Butler

choices: Ruth the once thin college student now weighing 200pounds
124.content:
After dealing with the dishes, Eliza grabbed a bag of chips and sat down in a chair. A huge gut now rested on her lap. Eliza was no longer the trim housewife she once was, and it was no mystery why. Her whole family couldn't help but witness the spectacle Eliza displayed at the dinner table everyday. Eliza would voraciously tear through the entire spread, out eating everyone else and leaving little for the rest of her deprived family. Today's breakfast was no different, despite preparing an impressive feast, Eliza ate far more than her fair share resulting in everyone else heading out with less than satisfied stomachs.

As Eliza was popping chips into her mouth she heard a knock at the door. The chair creaked as Eliza lifted her hefty body up to answer the door. Opening the door revealed...
124.title: Gets a Visit/Visits a family member

125.content:
Eliza waved her family off after they all had breakfast. She of course ate heartily, her bloated belly was proof of that. Eliza sat down as she gleefully rubbed her fat filled belly in satisfaction. Eliza loved eating, she didn't care in the slightest about being fat, which showed on her body. Eliza was once a thin and trim beauty but having a job and kids produced layers of fat on her. At first the sight of her trim body becoming smothered in fat was upsetting but the very notion of depriving herself of delicious food was painfully unappealing, so accepting reality, Eliza came to embrace her weight.

"Urp mmm what a lovely breakfast though a little small, I'll have to have a little snack. Oops but first I'll have to do the dishes." Eliza said. Eliza then gathered the dirty dishes but noticed that her kids' dishes still had food on them. "Oh how wasteful, clearly I'll have to do something about their appetites. Afterall they're still growing." Eliza reasoned. Eliza than...
125.title: She thinks about her children and decided they ...

choices: took her daughter to a restaurant
served her self and Emily much larger portions
1252.content:
"Especially that daughter of mine, she is far too thin. Then again she does swim maybe that's whats keeping her so thin. But still she really should finish her meals." Eliza said to herself staring at her daughter's unfinished meal. Eliza than decided that she was going to fatten up her daughter. "Yes Emily would be much better off as a fat girl, sure at that age a girl's weight is important but I'll make her get over it." Eliza planned. "Yes plenty of mother-daughter time will put some much needed meat on her bones. The rest of the afternoon, Eliza concocted a diabolical agenda that would render her daughter and herself as obese women.

Later that afternoon her kids returned. "Hey mom." greeted the kids to their mother sitting on the couch eating out of the ice cream carton. "Hey kids" Eliza greeted "Oh Emily come sit here with me." Eliza suggested patting the seat on the couch next to her plump ass. "Umm okay." Emily accepted the invitation. "Here have some." Eliza offering her daughter the carton. "Thanks mom." Emily answered scooping ice cream in her mouth. After a few spoonfuls Emily desisted "Thanks that hit the spot." Emily said. "Oh but sweety you hardly had any, you could have more." Eliza enticed taking another spoonful herself. "Thanks but I'm full I don't need anot-opphh!" Emily was cut off from her mother shoving a spoonful in her mouth. "Oh come now sweety no need to deprive yourself of tastey treats. Plus it'll only melt if you don't eat it." Eliza informed. "Well okay." Emily consented to her forceful mother. Emily than began finishing the carton all the while Eliza eyed her daughter's belly, anxious to see it bigger.

For dinner Eliza...
1252.title: focused on Emily

13.content:
Edward is a 16 year old in highschool, he usually enjoys reading comic books, watch movies and play videogames, he was a very fat kid but once he hit puberty he lost most of it with his growth spurt, but now his metabolism is normalizing and he is starting to get pudgy again.

Edward starts his day getting ready for:
13.title: Edward Butler

131.content:
Ed gets ready for school by putting on his regular clothes, although he feels his pants a little bit tight he shruggs it off thinking they shrunk in the washing machine. He goes down to eat breakfast with his brother and sister and then leaves in the school bus.
Then its time for:
131.title: Monday: School

choices: Math class - boring but pass it eating
1311.content:
Its time for lunch!

Ed heads to the cafeteria with oscar (his fat friend), after getting food they see mike seated at a table with alex (the fat nerdy girl). They seat down but somethings wrong, mike is eating lot more than usual, in fact all of them are. After a couple weeks back in school ed noticed how his friends ate more, including himself, although he didnt think anymore of it as he was starving and he started stuffing his face.

After everyone got seconds and ed oscar and alex got thirds, it was time for:
1311.title: Lunch Time

choices: Its not class its lunch time silly
1312.content:
Ed arrives at school and find his 2 best friends, Oscar whom he's known since they were 10 and Mike who just recently became his best friend.

Oscar is the same age as Edward, although he's taller than Ed at 5'9" he's also much fatter weighing around 250 lbs, hanging out with oscar is beginning to affect Ed's weigh since they both pig out when theyre together.
Mike is 15 years old and met Ed when starting highschool, they get along great because of the same taste in movies and videogames, Mike is 5'5" and is the skinniest of the friends weighing 140 lbs. Although hanging out with his new best friends may affect him too. Mike has a girlfriend called Lisa and although she goes to a different school mike normally hangs out with her on weekends along with his friends.

The bell rings after a couple of minutes and the boys head to class, mike being in a different year heads off to another floor while Ed and Oscar go to their class which is:
1312.title: Meeting with friends

13121.content:
Ed and Oscar go to their English class, Oscar stopping by the vending machine
"You're always eating" said Ed, "I know i just love food, want some?" Oscar offered some food to Ed which he accepted gladly.
"You know i always need to get food for this class, it gets boring as hell" Ed thought for a second "you're right" he said as he grabbed some food from the vending machine as well. "This should get us by until lunch time hahaha"
The pair entered class and took their seats. As the class progressed and the boys ate theire way through the "provisions" and talked about what were they going to do in the weekend.
The bell rang and it was time:
13121.title: English

131212.content:
The boys head to the cafeteria where they meet Alex, a nerdy girl that is one year ahead in school, she is also one of the biggest girls in school.
They meet here in the cafeteria and along with mike go to buy food. When they seat down they start talking about plans for the weekend
"we should go to the movies, Danny phantom is on" said mike. Alex suggested playing videogames at her house.
"I have to ask my mom if i can but sounds good"
As the plates were almost over it was time to:
131212.title: Lunch time

choices: Grabs some snacks and heads to his bedroom
Stay in the living room and watch TV
1312121.content: The bell rings and everyone goes to their class, soon the school day ends and Oscar as usual gives Ed a ride home, as soon as he enters hes greeted by his mother who also just got home. She tells Ed that supper will be ready soon, so Ed:
1312121.title: Head back to classes

13121211.content: Ed grab a couple of snacks when his mom tells him to take some for her sister who is in bed with her broken leg. He takes the extra snacks and heads upstairs passing through his "little" brother's room where he is seen sleeping with empty donut boxes around his bed. He goes to Emily's room and as he enters he sees her sister coming out of the bathroom in her pijamas "did her pijamas fit so tight before?" thought ed for a moment giving emily her snacks. As emily goes back to bed he sees his brother has much more snacks than her and teases him about it, "if you keep eating like that youll be bigger than oscar, haha" Ed left the room ignoring her sisters comment and goes to his bedroom.He plays videogames and eats When its time for:
13121211.title: Grabs some snacks and heads to his bedroom

choices: Next day: Weekend and gathering with his extended family
Next day: Weekend of doing nothing and just eating
131212111.content:
ED, EMILY, RICKY, TIME TO EAT! called out Eliza, their mother

The three kids came down rushing, richard huffing and puffing but getting there first, then ed who was starving, then emily who still needed help walking with her broken leg

Eliza saw her kids and noticed they all gained weight, with Emily being the more noticible one, and Richard being the least,but she didnt mind, everyone gets fat and then loses it in her family so she didnt think of it much. She served each a plate of steak and mashed potatoes, richard had three plates with Ed and Emily having 2 each.

After dinner Ed was stuffed, but his mind told him he still had room for something else, so he went for the chocolate ice cream in the freezer and went to his room, there he turned on the xbox and played all afternoon while he ate and ate.

After that he slept like a baby, a stuffed baby

Then:
131212111.title: Dinner

choices: To eat the lasagna, he wants it
He leaves the lasagna for tomorrow, hes too tired and stuffed to eat it
1312121111.content:
It was day for a big family meeting, relatives from everywhere came to Granny's birthday, she was a 80 year old 500 lb lady, who everybody loved, she was leonards mother and the family came from the butler side mostly.

Ed loves his inmediate family, and his granny too, although he didnt get to see most of his extended family he got along well with everyone, but Ed was mostly excited because his mother would be making her famous lasagna recipe wich he loved and always tried and get the most.

At the party he saw at a nearby table his aunt and uncle Ruth and Johnny, and their daughter who was also named ruth. Aunt Ruth was a big lady weighing almost 400 lbs and uncle Johnny was a slim guy weighing barely 140 lbs, their daughter ruth was slim most of her life but now at 19 and in college she was gaining weight like crazy closing in at 200 lbs and no signs of stopping.

At another table was sitting a pudgier emily with her friends, Sharon who was a thin girl with black hair and weighed 110 lbs, Lisa who was a fat and tall girl, she had red dyed hair and weighed 190 lbs and was 5'6", and finally Danny, who was a short girl who was 4'2" and barely weighed 90 lbs, although she was showing signs of getting pudgier with emily.

The next table was Granny Antoinette and Uncle Tim, Leonards brother, he was as tall as Leo but weighed half of what he weighed.

At the kids table was sitting Richard, that was Butler Family fattest child weighing close to 200 lbs for his young age, but he wasnt the only fat kid, in fact most of them his age or around his age were fat. there was cousin Gus, who was a 7 year old that weighed 142 lbs. Next was cousin Angela who was 11 years old and weighed 120 lbs. Then was Arnie who was a 10 year old that weighed 170 lbs. Finally there was Clara, a 8 year old who weighed 105 lbs.

At Leonards and Eliza's table was Eliza's sister, a thin woman who was a model and his husband who was also thin. they had no kids.

Finally at Ed's table were his cousins, Dave, a 14 year old that weighed 220 lbs, Dennise a slim 16 year old that weighed 115 lbs, and Kate, a very fat 17 year old, that weighed 340 lbs.

Butler Family was all about food and of course in a party like this, everyone concentrated mostly on eating for at least 3 hours or more. After eating all afternoon Ed was stuffed, but couldnt stop eating due to the delicious food and ate beyond the point of pain, as did his table and every table did it seems.

After the party ended Ed went to his room, carrying a big tray of her mom's lasagna and laid on his bed, feeling stuffed but seeing the lasagna he decides
1312121111.title: Next day: Weekend and gathering with his extend...

choices: Bought the game straight away, its about:
Waited to go with his friends to get the game
1313.content:
Ed rushed to his class ( as fast as a kid his weight could) and got just in time before it began

He greeted his friends and when the class started he paid attention...

...At least he tried to put attention but his head was thinking about a new game that was coming out that week, he wanted to play it so bad and couldnt think on something else

So the week was slow but then on friday he:
1313.title: Class

choices: Mike arrives and its time to go to the movies
Mike arrives and joins Ed and Oscar in eating again
132.content:
Its time to go to the mall
Edward asks his mom for a ride so he can go watch a movie with his friends
When he gets there he finds oscar who is a much fatter guy than edward and is always eating.
"hey oscar"
"sup man, mike hasnt arrived yet, we should wait for him in the food court, thats where i told him we'd meet"
"sounds good" said edward
Ed had just eaten dinner but as soon as they arrived he got hungry, and he could see in oscars face that he was hungry too, so they go and buy hamburgers
Then.
132.title: Friday: going to the Mall

1322.content:
Oscar is the same age as Edward, although he's taller than Ed at 5'9" he's also much fatter weighing around 250 lbs.
Mike is 5'5" and is the skinniest of the friends weighing 140 lbs and is 15 years old.

"Heey mike is here" said oscar in a break between bites of his XXL Burger
"Hey wassup, let me get some food and join you, what time is the movie?" said mike
"its at 7 and ill come with you im running out of food" said oscar
"oh and bring something for me!" said edward

They bought the food and ate until 630, the trio quite stuffed decided to head to the theater, then.
1322.title: Mike arrives and joins Ed and Oscar in eating a...

choices: Mike - looking as thin as usual
133.content:
It's movie time, and that means that edward heads to the mall to see his friends

Arriving there he sees Oscar as soon as he reaches the food court, oscar has always been chubby or even fat, but recently it seems that his appetite has increased as much if not a lot more than edwards.

Ed sits down next to oscar after getting some food for himself, a hamburger and the hundred nuggets promotion at Fatdonald's.

"Hey" Ed says with his mouth full "What time does mike get here?"

"Around 4 he said, but were meeting him at the theater, so hurry up cause its almost time"

That said both stuff their faces and finish all the food in less than 10 minutes

"Ok lets go" said oscar

At the movies they find:
133.title: Saturday: Movie night with friends

choices: Alex - The nerdy obese friend of Ed
Jimmy - Has several classes with Edward
Rory - Just transfered to Ed's school
1333.title: Another person entirely

13332.content:
Jimmy goes to Ed's school, although they dont talk much Ed has seen him around plenty.

Jimmy is a year younger than Ed, but he is much fatter, weighing 190 lbs and he is 5'8", he loves videogames as well and has a troubled family, with parents giving him lots of money but no attention.

Ed sees jimmy and he:
13332.title: Hey i know him, its jimmy

13333.content:
Rory is a tall very thin kid, he is 5'7" and weighs 130 lbs. He is stylish has money and likes to wear expensive stuff, although he is a good guy.
He is 15 years old and likes to draw, although he is not very good at studying he makes up for it with his charming personality and jokes.

Ed sees rory and:
13333.title: It's that new kid... Rory!

choices: sat down to play on the computer
Went for the hidden stash of food in richards room
134.content:
Its sunday!!

And as a rule in the butler family, sundays is spaghetti and meatballs day, no exceptions, this gives the family time to chat and catch up with each other on what happened during the week.

This week however edward was hungrier than usual, he took seconds and even a third bowl of spaghetti, although the only ones to notice were his mom (who thought it was just edward being a teen) and Emily (who didnt care as much and had also eaten a second bowl of spaghetti).

Junior feeling stuffed, excused himself from the table and went up to his room. He then:
134.title: Sunday: Dinner with family

choices: Its the summer - Ed just stays home and eats
Its winter - Lots of food and christmas presents
135.title: Other

1351.content:
Its summer time, Eds favorite because he has 3 months of not oging to school and just doing stuff with friends, videogames and food

And this summer has treated Ed good, gorging all day and playing games has made him gain 15 lbs in no time, and summers not even half way yet

so:
1351.title: Its the summer - Ed just stays home and eats

choices: Stands in front of the mirror and sees
Gets in the shower to get ready
Stay in bed with her mom bringing her food
Hang out with his brother edward watching movies
14.content:
Emily is 15 years old and the middle child in the family, shes always been very smart and got very good grades in school.She was also part of the swimming team all through middle school. Besides being good at school and sports she was also a party girl, since she turned 14 she started to party and go out drinking with her friends although her swimming always kept her weight at bay. One day while at the side of the pool she slipped and broke her foot, leaving her unable to walk for 3 months and after that she still couldnt walk very well.

Emilys day starts as she slowly tries to get out of bed with her foot in cast with her once slim frame having gained a couple of pounds:
14.title: Emily Butler

choices: 135 - a little weight, but now she's officially overweight
130 - She hasn't gained weight...but just lost muscle and gained fat
141.content:
Emily yawned loudly as she stretched her arms lazily into the air. Balling her thick fingers into plump little fists, she rose slowly, groggily glancing around at the mirror as she adjusted her shirt over her breasts and belly.

When she was 130, she had been a little on the thicker side, though most of her body was made of muscle mass. She pressed her fingers against her arms, feeling her muscles under a layer of pudge. She had really packed on some weight these past few weeks. She held her slightly fuller belly between her fingers, shaking it with a frown on her lips. Groaning, Emily plopped herself on her bed, patting her belly once more.

"I need to not be such a fat-ass," she mumbled, wondering just how much she had packed on.

After a few minutes of whiningE, she made her way to the bathroom, gingerly hoping not to put too much weight on her injured foot. After stepping on the scale, the number flashed...
141.title: Stands in front of the mirror and sees

1412.content:
Emily gasped. "15 pounds!? I wish I could swim and work this pudgy fat off, but my leg is still a little sore."
Emily also noticed a couple of buttons on her button-up shirt were a little on the tight side. And the button on her pants was undone to give room for her thighs and ass.
She looked in the mirror and saw that the fat had gone to her legs, ass, and gave her a little pot belly.
"Ugh, the doctor said it will be another four weeks until I can swim. I can't really work out either, so I'll just have to eat a lot less. At least there's no fat on my face, it stayed the same."

"Emily! Time for lunch! I made your favorite, meatball subs and fries! You need to eat it all up if you want to get better!" Her mother said
Emily tried to button her sweats but noticed her thighs were too big. So she put on some form fitting sweat pants and a pink t-shirt.

Emily walked down the stairs and came to the dinning room table. Her whole family was there. "Alright, I prepared three subs and fries for you. I expect you to eat it all. You need a full stomach if you want to heal up." Her mother said.
1412.title: 145 - She's gotten kinda chubby

14122.content:
Emily sat down and looked at the food in front of her. It smelled batter than any food she has ever witnessed. At first she took a couple bites of one of her subs. Then, she had a mouth-full of fries. She began stuffing herself with the meaty, saucy, cheesy subs and finished off her plate of fries. Within three minutes, she had finished her meal. She wanted to stop, but she couldn't resist. "Hey mom, could I have seconds?" She said. "Why of course honey. You need a little extra if you're going to make a speedy recovery."

Her mother laid a plate with another foot long meatball sub and rather than fries, gave her a plate of fatty mountains of spaghetti and meatballs. Emily Scarfed down the sub and ate the spaghetti with two forks. She was done with her seconds in about the time everyone was done with their first servings. Emily looked down at and noticed her pot belly had increased in size. Her shirt no longer fit and her sweat pants were tightening. She ran up stairs and looked in the mirror. She noticed that she was starting to develop a double chin and her shirt no longer fit her. Her big pot belly stuck out and her thighs were widened. The fat has not yet spread out, so her thighs and belly were the only parts of her body that were fattened.
14122.title: Totally pig out

141221.content:
Emily walked down stairs, ready to take a walk and burn off some fat. But then she heard "Emily, I noticed you're plumper from that meal I just fed you, but would you like some cake?"

Emily looked over at the dining room table. She saw a huge cake with frosting and ice cream. "Ok, just one piece."
She cut a piece of the tall cake covered with icecream and dug in. One slice turned to four and four turned into half the cake. With an expanded pot belly and cake on her face, Emily said "Mom, I'm sorry. It was just so good." "That's quite alright dear, I have another in the fridge."

"But maybe we should get you something more fitting. It looks like I've fattened you up a little too much! Don't worry though, I'm sure you'll work it off."
Emily blushed and looked down at her belly. The shirt didn't cover her belly button and the sweats were stretched to the limit. "Come with me to the mall and we can get you some new clothes. You're clearly not a small anymore like before the injury, so we'll get you some one-size fit's all sweats and a large T-shirt. I'll let you put on some of my clothes for the trip."

Emily went to her mother's room as her mother was starting up the car and getting her purse. Emily put on some of her mothers clothes. She put on a pair of sandles, streetchy black leggings for her widened hips, and a silky lavender dress shirt. The shirt was a little tight from her six month pregnant looking big pot belly, but everything else was fine. She put on some sunglasses to try to hide her face from any of her friends that may be at the mall. The mall was a popular meeting place for the girls at her high school, and she didn't want to be seen with a huge belly like that. It was the summer, and if she was seen she would become the laughing stock at her school.
141221.title: Desert

choices: She walks around looking for the clothes shop
1412211.content: Emily gets in her mother's car and her mother drives off. After a hour of driving, her mother was in the parking lot. Emily notices something. Her belly is beginning to soften and her fat is spreading around her body. She notices she has bigger calves and a fatty ass. She looks in the side mirror and notices she's starting to get a double chin. She feels her fluffy arms and looks at her plump hands. "It's official, I'm fat." She said to herself. Emily doesn't know it, but she has went from 150 pounds to 180 pounds in two sittings. That's 30 pounds she gained from half a cake, 5 footlong subs, a plate of fries, and three days worth of spaghetti and meatballs. However, this makes sense because of her slow metabolism and her mother's fatty cooking. Her mother parks the car and Emily gets out. Not use to her new hips and ass, she walks slowly for a few seconds, but then gets use to her new fat and walks over to the mall entrance. Jiggling with every step. She is mad about this and knows she'll need to work it off right after her leg heals up. She gets in and...
1412211.title: Go to the mall

14122111.content:
Emily walks around the mall for awhile. She sees a few girls from her school along the way. No one notices her in her new clothes and body. "Ok Emily, I want you to take this $100 and buy some clothes. I'll be in the mall's saloon."

Emily goes off and looks for a clothing store with her size. After 30 minutes she hasn't found any shop with her size. She is out of breath and takes a seat on a bench. "I never knew being fat would be this hard. Ugh, damn jelly rolls! It would have took me 12 laps to be this winded when I swam."

Emily spots an escalator to the next floor up. She takes it and sees a large ladies clothing store and a buffet. "Finally! I can get some cloths here! Well, maybe I could get something at that all you can eat buffet first. I'll just get a salad to restore some of my energy. It IS about time for supper."
14122111.title: She walks around looking for the clothes shop

choices: This is a dream, wake up
This isn't a dream, you just woke up from a coma
141222.content:
Emily went upstairs to take a nap. She quickly drifts into sleep. Or does she wake up?
She finds herself in her bed, 600 pounds. "What? This is a weird dream!" Emily gets out of bed and waddles around. She has panties and a bra on. "What is this? It feels so real." She hears a voice from down stairs "Emily! Get down here! It's time for breakfast. Put some clothes on and chow down. I made pancakes, waffles, eggs, bacon, pie, and hash browns! You're going to be late for school!"

Emily, playing along with the dream, opened her wardrobe and noticed she had a wide assortment of XXXXXL clothes. She took out some blue jeans, a yellow shirt, and red shoes and put them on. She waddled down the stairs. They were reinforced and extra wide. Walking down, she saw pictures of her at many different ages, all of them showed her morbidly obese.. She got down and saw her family at the dining table. "Sit down dear, and have some breakfast." Emily sat down and dug into her plate of food. She started eating her food. "This tastes so real. What's going on? Why can't I wake up?"
"Emily, this is a
141222.title: Take a nap

142.content:
Emily undresses and hops in the shower, as she walked in she noticed her thighs rubbing something they didnt do, she just shrugged it off and showered as usual.

After she got out she got dressed and noticed her clothes feeling a little bit tight,she started to think if she had put on weight but then she realized she was late for school, she finished dressing as fast as she could and rushed out her room and out her house, grabbing some toast for breakfast

As she arrived at school she realized
142.title: Gets in the shower to get ready

143.content:
As she laid in bed Emily just thinks "To hell with it, im tired i just wanna rest"

"Mom!, could you bring me some food?"

Her mom had some time off from work to take care of Emily, and she just wanted her daughter happy, and that meant giving her food most of the time

"Sure sweetie" yelled back her mom "do you want pancakes?"

"Oh my god yes!, thank you mon"

This 3 months with her leg broken had made Emily very lazy, and no signs of it stopping

After breakfast Emily:
143.title: Stay in bed with her mom bringing her food

choices: Was hooked up on the idea of being a fat girl
Was entertained but her brother was hooked!
They both decide to get fatter
144.content:
Before the accident that got Emily in bed, she and Edward weren't that close, sure they saw each other and cared for the other, but nothing much, but since the accident Ed helped her with a lot of stuff like homework and general stuff in the house, and almost every night they sat together and watched a movie while snacking.
This brought Emi and Ed closer, and also expanded their waistlines, the constant eating and lazyness made Emi go from 130 lbs to 150 lbs in 3 months, and Ed went from 160 lbs to 200 lbs in the same time, naturally both were oblivious to that and even though there was less space in the bed, they continued to eat with no remorse.

Today was movie night, and they decided to watch a sci fi movie, the pick of the day was 'Fat Lady from Sector 17'

As they both sat and watched the movie together and ate pizza Emily:
144.title: Hang out with his brother edward watching movies

15.content:
Richard Butler: 9 year old and youngest member in the family, even at his young age his love for food shows being an obese kid and one of the largest in his grade. He loves to play videogames, sit and do nothing and ocassionally chill in the family pool.

Ruth Butler: Edward, Emily's and Richard's Cousin, 19 year old girl starting her 2nd year of college, majoring in computer engineering, she mostly sits on the computer al day, she has always been skinny but the freshman 15 has pushed her weight into 200 lbs.
15.title: More of the family

151.content:
Richard Butler is nine years old age, and is the youngest of the family of five. Like the rest of his family though, he is obese, much bigger than any average kids in his school grade, and he’s very proud of it as a result. He had the look of a pear-shaped body, which meant his butt and thighs are much bigger than the rest of his body, though his belly is noticeably and hanged over his sweatpants he would normally wear, along with his t-shirt which both are much tight because of his weight.

He’s a very fun loving boy as far as his lifestyle is concerned. He would normally play video games, sitting there do nothing, and also he would occasionally go into the family-sized pool, just for the sake of it. He loves his family as much as they love him too, and they all have the same goals which they could try and get as much bigger and fatter as they can, even Richard can already imagine of himself on what he’ll look like.

Of course he would eat as many foods as he can non-stop, and this was his aim to make it possible. He’s already obese and certainly wants to be not only the biggest kid in the family, but the entire school too! He may be obsessed with it, but as long as he loves being big, he would enjoy his lifestyle as it is.

Richard was having a usual day when we can see him...
151.title: Richard Butler

153.content:
Emily's friends:

Sharon: Was a thin girl with black hair and weighed 110 lbs

Lisa: Was a fat and tall girl, she had red dyed hair and weighed 190 lbs and was 5'6"
153.title: How about:

1533.content:

15333.title: More Cousins

info.brief_description: Butler family members start gaining weight, will they like it or hate it
info.description:
The following is a list of the main characters in the story, more characters will be added as story progresses.

Leonard Butler: Father of 3, 44 year old, Hardworking thick guy. He works in a Casino as head of security and is working everyday until late, he uses any time he has left to spend it with wife and kids.He's 6'4" and 230 lbs

Eliza Butler: Wife of Leonard and devoted mother, she works as a highschool teacher in the mornings and always takes care of things at home, that includes making food and getting everything the kids need. She used to be thin until work and having kids made her current weight of 190lbs and is 5'5" tall.

Edward Butler: Oldest son of 3 in the butler family, he is a 16 year old teen who loves videogames, comics and movies, he was obese as a child but as he grew he lost most of his weight and he is now only 160 lbs, standing at 5'7" he is taller than most of his family but his metabolism is slowing down and he is slowly getting his old weight and more.

Emily Butler: 15 year old and middle child in the butler family, she stands 5'1" tall and weighs 130 lbs. She is the thinnest member of her family because she is used to swimming a lot. All that changes when she breaks her leg and cant move for 4 months and her weight starts to climb up.

Richard Butler: 9 year old and youngest member in the family, even at his young age his love for food shows being an obese kid and one of the largest in his grade. He loves to play videogames, sit and do nothing and ocassionally chill in the family pool.
